alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:01AM EDT until August 07 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in south central Indiana... West central Clark County in south central Indiana... Crawford County in south central Indiana... Western Floyd County in south central Indiana... Southeastern Orange County in south central Indiana... Southern Washington County in south central Indiana... North central Meade County in central Kentucky... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 101 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Paoli to 8 miles north of Carefree Town to near English, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corydon, English, Carefree Town, Galena, New Pekin, Palmyra, Marengo, Milltown, Borden and Greenville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
